page.title: 03SCIENCE IN SHREWSBURY.
page.content: Despite the depressed financial state of Industry, in 1985,{technology}is progressing on many fronts in Shrewsbury.{Perkins Engines Group, having recently acquired Rolls Royce Diesels,Shrewsbury's largest factory, continue the development of reciprocating,diesel oil engines for automotive,marine,electricity generation and military purposes.Water heating by solar radiation panels is marketed and developed by a local plumbing engineer;an important area of technology in these enery conscious times.{Computers}are in general use in most schools and basic electronics is being introduced to many children in primary schools. Research into heat forming of large area plastics is carried out in some Shrewsbury factories.Local medical{innovations include slit lamp biomicroscopy.
